statements: SELECT * FROM AdverseEventReports;
SELECT company_name, event_description FROM AdverseEventReports;
SELECT regulatory_authority, event_date FROM AdverseEventReports ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEventReports WHERE regulatory_authority = 'FDA';
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM AdverseEventReports GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEventReports WHERE company_name = 'Company A';
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM AdverseEventReports WHERE regulatory_authority = 'FDA' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, company_name, event_date FROM AdverseEventReports WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, regulatory_authority FROM AdverseEventReports WHERE company_name = 'Company B' OR company_name = 'Company C';
SELECT * FROM AdverseEventReports WHERE regulatory_authority = 'EMA' AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM adverse_event_reports;
SELECT event_description, report_date FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE company_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_authorities ORDER BY authority_name DESC;
SELECT event_description FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT company_id, COUNT(*) FROM adverse_event_reports GROUP BY company_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE company_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT event_description, report_date FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE report_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE authority_name LIKE '%FDA%';
SELECT report_id, event_description FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT authority_name FROM regulatory_authorities;
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT company_name, event_date FROM reports ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, event_description FROM reports WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contact_person, contact_email FROM company_contacts ORDER BY contact_person;
SELECT authority_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE authority_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, event_description FROM reports WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT company_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM regulatory_authorities JOIN company_contacts ON regulatory_authorities.contact_email = company_contacts.contact_email;
SELECT contact_person, company_name FROM company_contacts ORDER BY contact_person ASC, company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports JOIN regulatory_authorities ON reports.company_name = regulatory_authorities.authority_name WHERE event_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM adverse_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT authority_name, contact_person_name, contact_email FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE authority_id = 1;
SELECT reporter_name, event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT a.event_id, a.reporter_name, b.authority_name FROM adverse_events a JOIN event_reports e ON a.event_id = e.event_id JOIN regulatory_authorities b ON e.authority_id = b.authority_id;
SELECT DISTINCT reporter_name FROM adverse_events ORDER BY reporter_name DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, report_date FROM adverse_events JOIN event_reports ON adverse_events.event_id = event_reports.event_id;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents;
SELECT event_id, severity, description FROM AdverseEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM Companies WHERE location='New York';
SELECT DISTINCT reported_by FROM EventReports;
SELECT log_id, communication_type, communication_date FROM CommunicationLog ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents;
SELECT patient_id, event_date, description FROM AdverseEvents WHERE severity='Critical';
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryAuthorities ORDER BY authority_name DESC, phone_number ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, description FROM AdverseEvents WHERE severity='Moderate' LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, location, phone_number FROM Companies WHERE location='USA' OR location='Canada';
